alert.note: Alert for Central and East Adams and Arapahoe Counties; Central and South Weld County; North Douglas County Below 6000 Feet, Denver, West Adams and Arapahoe Counties, East Broomfield County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 18 at 4:46PM MDT by NWS Boulder
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of south central Weld and central Adams Counties through 515 PM MDT... At 445 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 5 miles northeast of D.I.A Terminal and Concourses to 4 miles west of Leader, or along a line extending from 22 miles northeast of Denver to 31 miles southwest of Fort Morgan. Movement was northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Northern Aurora and northeastern Denver International Airport. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: Prepare for sudden gusty winds. Secure loose objects and move to a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Central and East Adams and Arapahoe Counties; Central and South Weld County; North Douglas County Below 6000 Feet, Denver, West Adams and Arapahoe Counties, East Broomfield County
